title: Can't join game
body:
I'm trying to join a match just now but nothing happends. I've been trying to reconnect and restart my laptop but nothing happends. Please help quickly. I don't want a ban i don't deserve.

Edit: It says i can reconnect but whenever i press the reconnect button it says the game is running but i never join and the reconnect button appears again.

replies.body:
SOunds like your network is having some problems getting linked up with that game server again. If you can't get back in quickly enough, be sure to troubleshoot with these steps in a custom or practice game before hopping back into the queue.

Check out this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for steps on how you can setup your **Port Forwarding and DNS Settings**. Test these two steps and let me know if that's able to help.
